scripts.test:frontend: cd ./frontend && yarn test:unit && CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3001 yarn test:cypress
scripts.docker:test: yarn docker:test:up --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from backend && yarn test:backend && yarn test:frontend && yarn docker:stage:down
scripts.docker:test:e2e:frontend: yarn docker:stage:up && yarn test:frontend ; yarn docker:stage:down
scripts.docker:test:e2e:backend: yarn docker:stage:up && yarn test:backend ; yarn docker:stage:down
scripts.docker:push: yarn docker:test && yarn docker:push:backend && yarn docker:push:frontend
